00079 
00080 void
00081 R_init_flow_hash_tbl (L_Func * fn)
00082 {
00083   L_Flow *flow;
00084   L_Cb *cb;
00085   L_Oper *oper;
00086   HashTable hashTbl = flowHashTbl;
00087 
00088   for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb != NULL; cb = cb->next_cb)
00089     {
00090       flow = cb->dest_flow;
00091       for (oper = cb->first_op; oper != NULL; oper = oper->next_op)
00092         {
00093           if (!L_general_branch_opcode (oper))
00094             continue;
00095           HashTable_insert (hashTbl, oper->id, flow);
00096           flow = flow->next_flow;
00097         }
00098     }
00099 }
00100 
00101 void
00102 R_determine_region_flybys (L_Region * region)
00103 {
00104   Set in;
00105   int i, n_lv, *live_in = R_buf, vreg_id;
00106   L_Region_Boundary *bndry;
00107   R_Reg *vreg;
00108   L_Region_Regmap *regmap;
00109 
00110   for (bndry = region->entry_cbs; bndry != NULL; bndry = bndry->next_boundary)
00111     {
00112       if (bndry->bcb != NULL)
00113         {
00114           in = bndry->live_in;
00115 
00116           n_lv = Set_2array (in, live_in);
00117           for (i = 0; i < n_lv; i++)
00118             {
00119               if (!L_IS_MAPPED_REG (live_in[i]))
00120                 continue;
00121 
00122               vreg_id = L_UNMAP_REG (live_in[i]);
00123               regmap = L_find_region_regmap (R_Region, vreg_id);
00124 
00125               vreg = VREG (vreg_id);
00126               if (vreg == NULL)
00127                 {
00128                   /* We have an unrefereced flyby, we must create a vreg */
00129                   /* structure for it.  :)                               */
00130 
00131                   vreg = R_add_register (vreg_id, regmap->ctype, 0.0, 0);
00132                   vreg->flags |= R_PREALLOCATED_FLYBY;
00133                 }
00134               if (regmap->spill_loc != -1)
00135                 {
00136                   vreg->spill_loc = regmap->spill_loc;
00137                 }
00138             }
00139         }
00140     }
00141 }
00142 
00143 int
00144 R_find_base_from_phys_reg (int phys_reg, int type, int rclass)
00145 {
00146   int j, *map, size;
00147   int base;
00148   R_Physical_Bank *bank;
00149 
00150   base = -1;
00151   bank = R_bank + type + rclass;
00152   if (bank->defined)
00153     {
00154       map = R_map[type + rclass];
00155       size = bank->reg_size;
00156       for (j = 0; j < bank->num_reg; j++)
00157         {
00158           if (map[j * size] == phys_reg)
00159             {
00160               /*
00161                  fprintf(stderr,"Unmapping physical register %d "
00162                                 "to base index %d.\n",
00163                                 phys_reg,bank->base_index + j*bank->reg_size);
00164                */
00165               base = bank->base_index + j * bank->reg_size;
00166               break;
00167             }
00168         }
00169     }
00170   return (base);
00171 }
00172 
00173 void
00174 R_unmap_physical_registers (L_Region * region)
00175 {
00176   int i, type, base;
00177   int n_vreg, *vreg_array = R_buf;
00178   INT_Symbol *sym;
00179   L_Region_Regmap *regmap;
00180   Set occupied_base;
00181 
00182   if (region->regmap == NULL)
00183     return;
00184 
00185   if ((sym = region->regmap->head_symbol) != NULL)
00186     {
00187       for (sym = region->regmap->head_symbol;
00188            sym != NULL; sym = sym->next_symbol)
00189         {
00190           regmap = (L_Region_Regmap *) sym->data;
00191 
00192           type = R_Ltype_to_Rtype (regmap->ctype);
00193 
00194           if (regmap->phys_reg != -1)
00195             {
00196 
00197               if (regmap->type == L_OPERAND_REGISTER)
00198                 {
00199                   base = R_find_base_from_phys_reg (regmap->phys_reg,
00200                                                     type, R_CALLER);
00201                   if (base != -1)
00202                     {
00203                       regmap->phys_reg = base;
00204                       regmap->type = R_CALLER;
00205                     }
00206                 }
00207               else
00208                 {
00209                   base = R_find_base_from_phys_reg (regmap->phys_reg,
00210                                                     type, R_MACRO_CALLER);
00211                   if (base != -1)
00212                     {
00213                       regmap->phys_reg = base;
00214                       regmap->type = R_MACRO_CALLER;
00215                     }
00216                 }
00217               if (base == -1)
00218                 {
00219                   if (regmap->type == L_OPERAND_REGISTER)
00220                     {
00221                       base = R_find_base_from_phys_reg (regmap->phys_reg,
00222                                                         type, R_CALLEE);
00223                       if (base != -1)
00224                         {
00225                           regmap->phys_reg = base;
00226                           regmap->type = R_CALLEE;
00227                         }
00228                     }
00229                   else
00230                     {
00231                       base = R_find_base_from_phys_reg (regmap->phys_reg,
00232                                                         type, R_MACRO_CALLEE);
00233                       if (base != -1)
00234                         {
00235                           regmap->phys_reg = base;
00236                           regmap->type = R_MACRO_CALLEE;
00237                         }
00238                     }
00239                   if (base == -1)
00240                     L_warn ("R_unmap_physical_registers: "
00241                             "Unable to unmap phys_reg %d\n",
00242                             regmap->phys_reg);
00243                 }
00244             }
00245           n_vreg = Set_2array (regmap->occupied, vreg_array);
00246           occupied_base = NULL;
00247           for (i = 0; i < n_vreg; i++)
00248             {
00249               if ((base = R_find_base_from_phys_reg (vreg_array[i], type,
00250                                                      R_CALLER)) != -1 ||
00251                   (base = R_find_base_from_phys_reg (vreg_array[i], type,
00252                                                      R_MACRO_CALLER)) != -1 ||
00253                   (base = R_find_base_from_phys_reg (vreg_array[i], type,
00254                                                      R_CALLEE)) != -1 ||
00255                   (base = R_find_base_from_phys_reg (vreg_array[i], type,
00256                                                      R_MACRO_CALLEE)) != -1)
00257                 {
00258                   occupied_base = Set_add (occupied_base, base);
00259                 }
00260               else
00261                 {
00262                   L_warn ("R_unmap_physical_registers: "
00263                           "Unable to unmap phys_reg %d\n",
00264                           vreg_array[i]);
00265                 }
00266             }
00267           if (occupied_base != NULL)
00268             {
00269               Set_dispose (regmap->occupied);
00270               regmap->occupied = occupied_base;
00271             }
00272         }
00273     }
00274   return;
00275 }
00276 
00277 void
00278 R_determine_allocation_constraints (L_Region * region)
00279 {
00280   int i, n_vreg, *vreg_array = R_buf;
00281   int vreg_id;
00282   L_Cb *cb, *src_cb, *dst_cb;
00283   Set in, out, tmp;
00284   R_Reg *vreg;
00285   L_Region_Boundary *bndry;
00286   L_Region_Regmap *regmap;
00287 
00288 #ifdef  DEBUG_REGION_CONSTRAINTS
00289   fprintf (stderr, "****************************************\n");
00290   fprintf (stderr, "* Constraints on Region %d\n", region->id);
00291   fprintf (stderr, "*\n");
00292 #endif
00293 
00294   for (bndry = region->entry_cbs; bndry != NULL; bndry = bndry->next_boundary)
00295     {
00296       cb = bndry->ecb;
00297       src_cb = bndry->bcb;
00298 
00299       if (src_cb == NULL)
00300         continue;
00301 
00302       in = bndry->live_in;
00303       n_vreg = Set_2array (in, vreg_array);
00304       /*
00305        * Unmap the virtual register id's
00306        */
00307       tmp = NULL;
00308       for (i = 0; i < n_vreg; i++)
00309         {
00310           if (L_IS_MAPPED_REG (vreg_array[i]))
00311             {
00312               vreg_array[i] = L_UNMAP_REG (vreg_array[i]);
00313               tmp = Set_add (tmp, vreg_array[i]);
00314             }
00315           else
00316             vreg_array[i] = -1;
00317         }
00318 
00319 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_CONSTRAINTS
00320       fprintf (stderr, "* Entry from cb%d to cb%d\n", src_cb->id, cb->id);
00321       fprintf (stderr, "*\tBoundary Conditions : ");
00322 #endif
00323 
00324       for (i = 0; i < n_vreg; i++)
00325         {
00326           vreg_id = vreg_array[i];
00327 
00328           if (vreg_id == -1)
00329             continue;
00330 
00331           vreg = VREG (vreg_id);
00332 
00333           if (vreg->flags & R_PREALLOCATED_MACRO)
00334             continue;
00335 
00336           regmap = L_find_region_regmap (region, vreg->index);
00337 
00338 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_CONSTRAINTS
00339           fprintf (stderr, "*\tVREG     %d :", vreg->index);
00340           if (vreg->flags & R_PREALLOCATED_FLYBY)
00341             fprintf (stderr, "(FB) ");
00342 #endif
00343 
00344           if (regmap->phys_reg != -1)
00345             {
00346 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_CONSTRAINTS
00347               fprintf (stderr, " allocated (GLOBAL) -> %d\n",
00348                        regmap->phys_reg);
00349 #endif
00350               vreg->flags |= R_REGION_CONSTRAINED;
00351             }
00352           else if (regmap->spill_loc != -1)
00353             {
00354 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_CONSTRAINTS
00355               fprintf (stderr, " spilled (GLOBAL) -> mem[%d]\n",
00356                        regmap->spill_loc);
00357 #endif
00358             }
00359           else
00360             {
00361               vreg->constraints = Set_union_acc (vreg->constraints,
00362                                                  regmap->occupied);
00363 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_CONSTRAINTS
00364               Set_print (stderr, " unusable", vreg->constraints);
00365 #endif
00366             }
00367         }
00368       Set_dispose (tmp);
00369     }
00370 
00371   for (bndry = region->exit_cbs; bndry != NULL; bndry = bndry->next_boundary)
00372     {
00373       cb = bndry->ecb;
00374       dst_cb = bndry->bcb;
00375 
00376       if (dst_cb == NULL)
00377         continue;
00378 
00379       out = L_get_region_exit_OUT_set (region, dst_cb);
00380       n_vreg = Set_2array (out, vreg_array);
00381       /*
00382        * Unmap the virtual register id's
00383        */
00384       tmp = NULL;
00385       for (i = 0; i < n_vreg; i++)
00386         {
00387           if (L_IS_MAPPED_REG (vreg_array[i]))
00388             {
00389               vreg_array[i] = L_UNMAP_REG (vreg_array[i]);
00390               tmp = Set_add (tmp, vreg_array[i]);
00391             }
00392           else
00393             {
00394               vreg_array[i] = -1;
00395             }
00396         }
00397 #ifdef  DEBUG_REGION_CONSTRAINTS
00398       fprintf (stderr, "* Exit from cb%d to cb%d\n", cb->id, dst_cb->id);
00399       fprintf (stderr, "*       Boundary Conditions : ");
00400       Set_print (stderr, "", out);
00401 #endif
00402 
00403       for (i = 0; i < n_vreg; i++)
00404         {
00405           vreg_id = vreg_array[i];
00406 
00407           if (vreg_id == -1)
00408             continue;
00409 
00410           vreg = VREG (vreg_id);
00411 
00412           if (vreg->flags & R_PREALLOCATED_MACRO)
00413             continue;
00414 
00415           regmap = L_find_region_regmap (region, vreg->index);
00416 
00417 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_CONSTRAINTS
00418           fprintf (stderr, "*\tVREG     %d :", vreg->index);
00419           if (vreg->flags & R_PREALLOCATED_FLYBY)
00420             fprintf (stderr, "(FB) ");
00421 #endif
00422 
00423           if (regmap->phys_reg != -1)
00424             {
00425 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_CONSTRAINTS
00426               fprintf (stderr, " allocated (GLOBAL) -> %d\n",
00427                        regmap->phys_reg);
00428 #endif
00429               vreg->flags |= R_REGION_CONSTRAINED;
00430             }
00431           else if (regmap->spill_loc != -1)
00432             {
00433 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_CONSTRAINTS
00434               fprintf (stderr, " spilled (GLOBAL) -> mem[%d]\n",
00435                        regmap->spill_loc);
00436 #endif
00437             }
00438           else
00439             {
00440               vreg->constraints = Set_union_acc (vreg->constraints,
00441                                                  regmap->occupied);
00442 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_CONSTRAINTS
00443               Set_print (stderr, " unusable", vreg->constraints);
00444 #endif
00445             }
00446         }
00447       Set_dispose (tmp);
00448     }
00449 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_CONSTRAINTS
00450   fprintf (stderr, "****************************************\n");
00451 #endif
00452 }
00453 
00454 double
00455 R_determine_reconcile_cost (L_Region * region, R_Reg * vreg,
00456                             double *store_cost, double *load_cost)
00457 {
00458   L_Cb *cb, *src_cb, *dst_cb;
00459   L_Flow *flow;
00460   L_Region_Boundary *bndry;
00461   L_Region_Regmap *regmap;
00462   L_Region_Regcon *regcon;
00463   Set in, out;
00464   double allocated, spilled, weight;
00465   double load, store;
00466 
00467   allocated = spilled = 0.0;
00468   load = *load_cost;
00469   store = *store_cost;
00470 
00471   for (bndry = region->entry_cbs; bndry != NULL; bndry = bndry->next_boundary)
00472     {
00473       cb = bndry->ecb;
00474       src_cb = bndry->bcb;
00475 
00476       if (src_cb == NULL)
00477         continue;
00478 
00479       in = bndry->live_in;
00480       if (Set_in (in, L_REG_INDEX (vreg->index)))
00481         vreg->flags |= R_LIVE_OUTSIDE_REGION;
00482 
00483       /*
00484        * Check to see what action was taken on the incoming src_cb.
00485        * If nothing, then we may ignore it.
00486        */
00487       regmap = L_find_region_regmap (region, vreg->index);
00488       if (regmap == NULL)
00489         continue;
00490 
00491       regcon = L_find_regcon_for_cb (regmap, src_cb);
00492       if (regcon == NULL)
00493         continue;
00494 
00495       /*
00496        * Determine the weight of all incoming arcs from src_cb
00497        */
00498       weight = 0.0;
00499       for (flow = src_cb->dest_flow; flow != NULL; flow = flow->next_flow)
00500         {
00501           if (flow->dst_cb == cb)
00502             weight += flow->weight;
00503         }
00504 
00505       /*
00506        * If the current vreg were to be allocated
00507        */
00508       if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_ALLOC)
00509         {
00510           /* locally allocated and allocated in src, */
00511           /* thus no correction code is required.    */
00512         }
00513       else if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_SPILL)
00514         {
00515           /* locally allocated, but spilled in src,   */
00516           /* a load is required in the current region */
00517           allocated += weight * load;
00518         }
00519 
00520 
00521       /*
00522        * If the current vreg were to be spilled 
00523        */
00524       if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_ALLOC)
00525         {
00526           /* locally spilled, but allocated in src,    */
00527           /* a store is required in the current region */
00528           spilled += weight * store;
00529         }
00530       else if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_SPILL)
00531         {
00532           /* locally spilled and spilled in src, */
00533           /* therefore no correction code is required */
00534         }
00535     }
00536   for (bndry = region->exit_cbs; bndry != NULL; bndry = bndry->next_boundary)
00537     {
00538       cb = bndry->ecb;
00539       dst_cb = bndry->bcb;
00540 
00541       if (dst_cb == NULL)
00542         continue;
00543 
00544       out = L_get_region_exit_OUT_set (region, dst_cb);
00545       if (Set_in (out, L_REG_INDEX (vreg->index)))
00546         vreg->flags |= R_LIVE_OUTSIDE_REGION;
00547 
00548       /*
00549        * Check to see what action was taken on the incoming src_cb.
00550        * If nothing, then we may ignore it.
00551        */
00552       regmap = L_find_region_regmap (region, vreg->index);
00553       if (regmap == NULL)
00554         continue;
00555 
00556       regcon = L_find_regcon_for_cb (regmap, dst_cb);
00557       if (regcon == NULL)
00558         continue;
00559 
00560       /*
00561        * Determine the weight of all incoming arcs from src_cb
00562        */
00563       weight = 0.0;
00564       for (flow = cb->dest_flow; flow != NULL; flow = flow->next_flow)
00565         {
00566           if (flow->dst_cb == dst_cb)
00567             weight += flow->weight;
00568         }
00569       /*
00570          * If the current vreg were to be allocated
00571        */
00572       if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_ALLOC)
00573         {
00574           /* locally allocated, and allocated in dst, */
00575           /* therefore no correction code is required */
00576         }
00577       else if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_SPILL)
00578         {
00579           /* locally allocated, but spilled in dst, thus */
00580           /* a store is required in the current region   */
00581           allocated += weight * store;
00582         }
00583 
00584 
00585       /*
00586        * If the current vreg were to be spilled 
00587        */
00588       if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_ALLOC)
00589         {
00590           /* locally spilled, and allocated in dst,        */
00591           /* thus a load is required in the current region */
00592           spilled += weight * load;
00593         }
00594       else if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_SPILL)
00595         {
00596           /* locally spilled, and spilled in dst */
00597           /* No correction code is required      */
00598         }
00599     }
00600   return (spilled - allocated);
00601 }
00602 
00603 
00604 
00605 RCB *rcbList = NULL;
00606 
00607 static RCB *
00608 newRCB ()
00609 {
00610   RCB *new_rcb = (RCB *) malloc (sizeof (RCB));
00611 
00612   new_rcb->location = NULL;
00613   new_rcb->fromCb = NULL;
00614   new_rcb->toCb = NULL;
00615   new_rcb->flow = NULL;
00616   new_rcb->branch = NULL;
00617   new_rcb->stores = NULL;
00618   new_rcb->store_loc = NULL;
00619   new_rcb->loads = NULL;
00620   new_rcb->load_loc = NULL;
00621   new_rcb->nextRCB = NULL;
00622 
00623   return (new_rcb);
00624 }
00625 
00626 static void
00627 freeRCB (RCB * rcb)
00628 {
00629   Set_dispose (rcb->store_loc);
00630   Set_dispose (rcb->load_loc);
00631   free (rcb);
00632 }
00633 
00634 
00635 static RCB *
00636 findRCB (L_Cb * fromCb, L_Cb * toCb)
00637 {
00638   RCB *tmp = rcbList;
00639 
00640   while (tmp != NULL)
00641     {
00642       if (tmp->fromCb == fromCb && tmp->toCb == toCb    /* &&
00643                                                            tmp->branch == branch */ )
00644         break;
00645       tmp = tmp->nextRCB;
00646     }
00647   return (tmp);
00648 }
00649 
00650 void
00651 R_add_store (L_Region * region, L_Cb * fromCb, L_Cb * toCb, R_Reg * vreg,
00652              L_Region_Regmap * regmap)
00653 {
00654   L_Cb *insCb;
00655   L_Oper *oper;
00656   L_Operand opd;
00657   RCB *rcb;
00658 
00659   if (!L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (fromCb->flags, L_CB_BOUNDARY))
00660     {
00661       insCb = fromCb;
00662 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_RECONCILE
00663       fprintf (stderr, "*\tInsert Store %d -> mem[%d] into Cb %d\n",
00664                vreg->base_index, regmap->spill_loc, insCb->id);
00665 #endif
00666 
00667     }
00668   else
00669     {
00670       insCb = toCb;
00671 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_RECONCILE
00672       fprintf (stderr, "*\tInsert Store %d -> mem[%d] into Cb %d\n",
00673                vreg->base_index, regmap->spill_loc, insCb->id);
00674 #endif
00675 
00676     }
00677   opd.type = R_conv_rclass_to_Lclass (vreg->rclass);
00678   opd.ctype = R_conv_type_to_Ltype (vreg->type);
00679   opd.value.r = vreg->index;
00680 
00681   rcb = findRCB (fromCb, toCb);
00682 
00683   if (rcb && Set_in (rcb->store_loc, regmap->spill_loc))
00684     {
00685       /* The current location has already been spilled in this block */
00686       /* thus there is no need to perform another                    */
00687       return;
00688     }
00689 
00690   oper =
00691     O_spill_reg (regmap->phys_reg, R_conv_rclass_to_Lclass (vreg->rclass),
00692                  &opd, regmap->spill_loc, NULL, R_SPILL_CODE);
00693 
00694   if (rcb != NULL)
00695     {
00696       oper->next_op = rcb->stores;
00697       rcb->stores = oper;
00698     }
00699   else
00700     {
00701       rcb = newRCB ();
00702 #if 0
00703       if (branch == NULL)
00704         rcb->location = fromCb;
00705 #endif
00706       rcb->fromCb = fromCb;
00707       rcb->toCb = toCb;
00708 #if 0
00709       rcb->flow = flow;
00710       rcb->branch = branch;
00711 #endif
00712       rcb->stores = oper;
00713       oper->next_op = NULL;
00714 
00715       rcb->nextRCB = rcbList;
00716       rcbList = rcb;
00717     }
00718   rcb->store_loc = Set_add (rcb->store_loc, vreg->spill_loc);
00719 }
00720 
00721 
00722 void
00723 R_add_load (L_Region * region, L_Cb * fromCb, L_Cb * toCb, R_Reg * vreg,
00724             L_Region_Regmap * regmap)
00725 {
00726   L_Cb *insCb;
00727   L_Oper *oper;
00728   L_Operand opd;
00729   RCB *rcb;
00730 
00731   if (!L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (fromCb->flags, L_CB_BOUNDARY))
00732     {
00733       insCb = fromCb;
00734 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_RECONCILE
00735       fprintf (stderr, "*\tInsert Load %d <- mem[%d] into Cb %d\n",
00736                vreg->base_index, regmap->spill_loc, insCb->id);
00737 #endif
00738     }
00739   else
00740     {
00741       insCb = toCb;
00742 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_RECONCILE
00743       fprintf (stderr, "*\tInsert Load %d <- mem[%d] into Cb %d\n",
00744                vreg->base_index, regmap->spill_loc, insCb->id);
00745 #endif
00746     }
00747 
00748   opd.type = R_conv_rclass_to_Lclass (vreg->rclass);
00749   opd.ctype = R_conv_type_to_Ltype (vreg->type);
00750   opd.value.r = vreg->index;
00751 
00752   rcb = findRCB (fromCb, toCb);
00753   if (rcb && Set_in (rcb->load_loc, regmap->spill_loc))
00754     {
00755       /* The current location has already been spilled in this block */
00756       /* thus there is no need to perform another                    */
00757       /*
00758          fprintf(stderr,"Redundant load detected\n");
00759        */
00760       return;
00761     }
00762 
00763   oper = O_fill_reg (regmap->phys_reg, R_conv_rclass_to_Lclass (vreg->rclass),
00764                      &opd, regmap->spill_loc, NULL, R_SPILL_CODE);
00765 
00766   if (rcb != NULL)
00767     {
00768       oper->next_op = rcb->loads;
00769       rcb->loads = oper;
00770     }
00771   else
00772     {
00773       rcb = newRCB ();
00774 #if 0
00775       if (branch == NULL)
00776         rcb->location = fromCb;
00777 #endif
00778       rcb->fromCb = fromCb;
00779       rcb->toCb = toCb;
00780 #if 0
00781       rcb->flow = flow;
00782       rcb->branch = branch;
00783 #endif
00784       rcb->loads = oper;
00785       oper->next_op = NULL;
00786 
00787       rcb->nextRCB = rcbList;
00788       rcbList = rcb;
00789     }
00790   rcb->load_loc = Set_add (rcb->load_loc, vreg->spill_loc);
00791 }
00792 
00793 void
00794 R_insert_reconciliation_code (L_Func * fn, L_Region * region)
00795 {
00796   /* 10/25/04 REK Commenting out unused variable to quiet compiler warning. */
00797 #if 0
00798   int ext;
00799 #endif
00800   RCB *rcb, *next;
00801   L_Flow *flow;
00802   L_Oper *oper, *next_op, *jump;
00803   L_Cb *new_cb;
00804   double weight;
00805 
00806   for (rcb = rcbList; rcb != NULL; rcb = next)
00807     {
00808       next = rcb->nextRCB;
00809 
00810       weight = 0.0;
00811       new_cb = L_create_cb (weight);
00812       for (oper = rcb->fromCb->first_op; oper != NULL; oper = oper->next_op)
00813         {
00814           if (!L_general_branch_opcode (oper))
00815             continue;
00816 
00817           flow = L_find_flow_for_branch (rcb->fromCb, oper);
00818           if (L_register_branch_opcode (oper))
00819             {
00820               while (flow)
00821                 {
00822                   if (flow->dst_cb == rcb->toCb)
00823                     {
00824                       flow->dst_cb = new_cb;
00825                       weight += flow->weight;
00826                     }
00827                   flow = flow->next_flow;
00828                 }
00829             }
00830           else
00831             {
00832               if (flow->dst_cb == rcb->toCb)
00833                 {
00834                   flow->dst_cb = new_cb;
00835                   weight += flow->weight;
00836                 }
00837             }
00838           L_change_branch_dest (oper, rcb->toCb, new_cb);
00839 #if 0
00840 #ifndef OPENIMPACT_DISTRIBUTION
00841           if (M_arch == M_HPPA)
00842             {
00843               L_get_attribute (oper, &ext);
00844               L_set_attribute (oper,
00845                                EXT (CBR_FORWARD_EXT, NULL_COND (ext),
00846                                     INSTR_EXT (ext)));
00847             }
00848 #endif
00849 #endif
00850         }
00851       if (!L_uncond_branch_opcode (rcb->fromCb->last_op) &&
00852           !L_register_branch_opcode (rcb->fromCb->last_op) &&
00853           ((flow = L_find_last_flow (rcb->fromCb->dest_flow)) != NULL))
00854         {
00855           /* Make sure the fall thru flow is also changed if necessary */
00856           if (flow->dst_cb == rcb->toCb)
00857             {
00858               flow->dst_cb = new_cb;
00859               weight += flow->weight;
00860 
00861               if (rcb->fromCb->next_cb != new_cb)
00862                 {
00863                   /* Must insert unconditional branch */
00864                   L_Oper *new_oper = L_create_new_op (Lop_JUMP);
00865                   new_oper->src[0] = L_new_cb_operand (new_cb);
00866 
00867                   L_insert_oper_after (rcb->fromCb, rcb->fromCb->last_op,
00868                                        new_oper);
00869                 }
00870             }
00871         }
00872 
00873       new_cb->weight = weight;
00874 #if 0
00875       fprintf (stderr, "# NEWCB %d between Cb %d and Cb %d\n",
00876                new_cb->id, rcb->fromCb->id, rcb->toCb->id);
00877 #endif
00878 
00879       /* Insert instructions into cb */
00880       for (oper = rcb->stores; oper != NULL; oper = next_op)
00881         {
00882           next_op = oper->next_op;
00883           oper->flags = L_SET_BIT_FLAG (oper->flags, L_OPER_SPILL_CODE);
00884           L_insert_oper_after (new_cb, new_cb->first_op, oper);
00885 #if 0
00886           L_print_oper (stderr, oper);
00887 #endif
00888           total_region_spill_weight += new_cb->weight;
00889         }
00890       for (oper = rcb->loads; oper != NULL; oper = next_op)
00891         {
00892           next_op = oper->next_op;
00893           oper->flags = L_SET_BIT_FLAG (oper->flags, L_OPER_SPILL_CODE);
00894           L_insert_oper_after (new_cb, new_cb->last_op, oper);
00895 #if 0
00896           L_print_oper (stderr, oper);
00897 #endif
00898           total_region_spill_weight += new_cb->weight;
00899         }
00900 
00901 
00902       /* Insert jump instruction into cb */
00903       jump = (L_Oper *) O_jump_oper (Lop_JUMP, rcb->toCb);
00904 #if 0
00905 #ifndef OPENIMPACT_DISTRIBUTION
00906       if (M_arch == M_HPPA)
00907         {
00908           L_set_attribute (jump, EXT (CBR_BACKWARD_EXT, 0, 0));
00909         }
00910 #endif
00911 #endif
00912       L_insert_oper_after (new_cb, new_cb->last_op, jump);
00913 
00914 
00915 
00916       new_cb->dest_flow = L_new_flow (1, new_cb, rcb->toCb, weight);
00917 
00918       L_insert_cb_after (fn, fn->last_cb, new_cb);
00919 
00920       freeRCB (rcb);
00921 
00922       /*
00923        * Update region exit boundary information
00924        */
00925       if (L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (rcb->toCb->flags, L_CB_EXIT_BOUNDARY))
00926         {
00927           L_change_region_exit_cb (fn->first_region, rcb->fromCb,
00928                                    new_cb, rcb->toCb);
00929         }
00930     }
00931 }
00932 
00933 void
00934 R_reconcile_allocated_region (L_Region * region)
00935 {
00936   int i, vreg_id, n_vreg, *vreg_array = R_buf;
00937   L_Cb *cb, *src_cb, *dst_cb;
00938   Set in, out;
00939   R_Reg *vreg;
00940   L_Region_Boundary *bndry;
00941   L_Region_Regmap *regmap;
00942   L_Region_Regcon *regcon;
00943 
00944 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_RECONCILE
00945   fprintf (stderr, "****************************************\n");
00946   fprintf (stderr, "* Reconciling Region %d\n", region->id);
00947   fprintf (stderr, "*\n");
00948 #endif
00949   rcbList = NULL;
00950 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_RECONCILE
00951   fprintf (stderr, "* Entry points\n");
00952 #endif
00953   for (bndry = region->entry_cbs; bndry != NULL; bndry = bndry->next_boundary)
00954     {
00955       cb = bndry->ecb;
00956       src_cb = bndry->bcb;
00957 
00958       if (src_cb == NULL)
00959         continue;
00960 
00961       in = bndry->live_in;
00962 
00963       n_vreg = Set_2array (in, vreg_array);
00964       for (i = 0; i < n_vreg; i++)
00965         {
00966           vreg_id = vreg_array[i];
00967 
00968           if (!L_IS_MAPPED_REG (vreg_id))
00969             continue;
00970 
00971           vreg = VREG (L_UNMAP_REG (vreg_id));
00972 
00973           if (vreg->flags & R_PREALLOCATED_MACRO)
00974             continue;
00975 
00976           regmap = L_find_region_regmap (region, vreg->index);
00977 
00978           regcon = L_find_regcon_for_cb (regmap, src_cb);
00979           if (regcon == NULL)
00980             continue;
00981 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_RECONCILE
00982           fprintf (stderr, "VREG %d\n", vreg->index);
00983 #endif
00984           if (vreg->flags & R_SPILLED)
00985             {
00986               if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_ALLOC)
00987                 {
00988                   /* locally spilled, but allocated in src */
00989 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_RECONCILE
00990                   fprintf (stderr, "\tlocally spilled, src allocated -> %d\n",
00991                            regmap->phys_reg);
00992 #endif
00993                   R_add_store (region, src_cb, cb, vreg, regmap);
00994                 }
00995               else if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_SPILL)
00996                 {
00997                   /* locally spilled and spilled in src */
00998                 }
00999               else if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_IGNORE)
01000                 {
01001                   /* If a cb says the lifetime was ignored, then this is */
01002                   /* the first action taken, i.e. it is spilled first.   */
01003                   /* Nothing need be done.  Future regions will see the  */
01004                   /* lifetime as spilled in the src region.              */
01005                 }
01006             }
01007           else if (vreg->base_index != -1)
01008             {
01009               /* Aaah, so we locally allocated the bloomin' thing. */
01010               if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_ALLOC)
01011                 {
01012                   /* locally allocated and src allocated */
01013                 }
01014               else if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_SPILL)
01015                 {
01016                   /* locally allocated, but src spilled */
01017 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_RECONCILE
01018                   fprintf (stderr,
01019                            "\tlocally allocated, src spilled -> mem[%d]\n",
01020                            regmap->spill_loc);
01021 #endif
01022                   R_add_load (region, src_cb, cb, vreg, regmap);
01023                 }
01024               else if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_IGNORE)
01025                 {
01026                   /* If a cb says the lifetime was ignored, then this is */
01027                   /* the first action taken, i.e. it is allocated first. */
01028                   /* Nothing need be done.  Future regions will see the  */
01029                   /* lifetime as allocated in the src region.            */
01030                 }
01031             }
01032           else
01033             {
01034               /* Otherwise we ignored it completely */
01035               if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_ALLOC)
01036                 {
01037                   /* locally ignored, src allocated */
01038                   if (regmap->flags & L_REGION_VREG_SPILL)
01039                     {
01040 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_RECONCILE
01041                       fprintf (stderr, "\tlocally ignored, src allocated\n");
01042 #endif
01043                       R_add_store (region, src_cb, cb, vreg, regmap);
01044                     }
01045                 }
01046               else if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_SPILL)
01047                 {
01048                   /* locally ignores, but spilled in source */
01049                   if (regmap->flags & L_REGION_VREG_ALLOC)
01050                     {
01051 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_RECONCILE
01052                       fprintf (stderr, "\tlocally ignored, src spilled\n");
01053 #endif
01054                       R_add_load (region, src_cb, cb, vreg, regmap);
01055                     }
01056                 }
01057             }
01058         }
01059     }
01060 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_RECONCILE
01061   fprintf (stderr, "* Exit points\n");
01062 #endif
01063   for (bndry = region->exit_cbs; bndry != NULL; bndry = bndry->next_boundary)
01064     {
01065       cb = bndry->ecb;
01066       dst_cb = bndry->bcb;
01067 
01068       if (dst_cb == NULL)
01069         continue;
01070 
01071       out = L_get_region_exit_OUT_set (region, dst_cb);
01072 
01073       n_vreg = Set_2array (out, vreg_array);
01074       for (i = 0; i < n_vreg; i++)
01075         {
01076           vreg_id = vreg_array[i];
01077 
01078           if (!L_IS_MAPPED_REG (vreg_id))
01079             continue;
01080 
01081           vreg = VREG (L_UNMAP_REG (vreg_id));
01082 
01083           if (vreg->flags & R_PREALLOCATED_MACRO)
01084             {
01085               continue;
01086             }
01087           regmap = L_find_region_regmap (region, vreg->index);
01088 
01089           regcon = L_find_regcon_for_cb (regmap, dst_cb);
01090           if (regcon == NULL)
01091             continue;
01092 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_RECONCILE
01093           fprintf (stderr, "VREG %d\n", vreg->index);
01094 #endif
01095           if (vreg->flags & R_SPILLED)
01096             {
01097               if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_ALLOC)
01098                 {
01099                   /* locally spilled, but allocated in src */
01100 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_RECONCILE
01101                   fprintf (stderr, "\tlocally spilled, dst allocated -> %d\n",
01102                            regmap->phys_reg);
01103 #endif
01104                   R_add_load (region, cb, dst_cb, vreg, regmap);
01105                 }
01106               else if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_SPILL)
01107                 {
01108                   /* locally spilled and spilled in dst */
01109                 }
01110               else if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_IGNORE)
01111                 {
01112                   /* If a cb says the lifetime was ignored, then this is */
01113                   /* the first action taken, i.e. it is spilled first.   */
01114                   /* Nothing need be done.  Future regions will see the  */
01115                   /* lifetime as spilled in the dst region.              */
01116                 }
01117             }
01118           else if (vreg->base_index != -1)
01119             {
01120               /* Aaah, so we locally allocated the bloomin' thing. */
01121               if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_ALLOC)
01122                 {
01123                   /* locally allocated and dst allocated */
01124                 }
01125               else if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_SPILL)
01126                 {
01127                   /* locally allocated, but dst spilled */
01128 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_RECONCILE
01129                   fprintf (stderr,
01130                            "\tlocally allocated, dst spilled -> mem[%d]\n",
01131                            regmap->spill_loc);
01132 #endif
01133                   R_add_store (region, cb, dst_cb, vreg, regmap);
01134                 }
01135               else if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_IGNORE)
01136                 {
01137                   /* If a cb says the lifetime was ignored, then this is */
01138                   /* the first action taken, i.e. it is allocated first. */
01139                   /* Nothing need be done.  Future regions will see the  */
01140                   /* lifetime as allocated in the src region.            */
01141                 }
01142             }
01143           else
01144             {
01145               /* Otherwise we ignored it completely */
01146               if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_ALLOC)
01147                 {
01148                   /* locally ignored, src allocated */
01149                   if (regmap->flags & L_REGION_VREG_SPILL)
01150                     {
01151 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_RECONCILE
01152                       fprintf (stderr, "\tlocally ignored, dst allocated\n");
01153 #endif
01154                       R_add_load (region, cb, dst_cb, vreg, regmap);
01155                     }
01156                 }
01157               else if (regcon->flags & L_REGION_VREG_SPILL)
01158                 {
01159                   /* locally ignores, but spilled in source */
01160                   if (regmap->flags & L_REGION_VREG_ALLOC)
01161                     {
01162 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_RECONCILE
01163                       fprintf (stderr, "\tlocally ignored, dst spilled\n");
01164 #endif
01165                       R_add_store (region, cb, dst_cb, vreg, regmap);
01166                     }
01167                 }
01168             }
01169         }
01170     }
01171 
01172 #ifdef DEBUG_REGION_RECONCILE
01173   fprintf (stderr, "****************************************\n");
01174 #endif
01175 }
01176 
01177 void
01178 R_update_alloc_state (L_Region * region)
01179 {
01180   int reg, *phys_map;
01181   int i, j, n_reg, *reg_array = R_buf;
01182   R_Physical_Bank *bank;
01183   R_Reg *vreg_ptr;
01184   Set flyby_constraints = NULL;
01185   L_Region_Regmap *regmap;
01186   Set occupied_phys_reg;
01187 
01188   for (vreg_ptr = R_vreg; vreg_ptr != NULL; vreg_ptr = vreg_ptr->nextReg)
01189     {
01190       if (vreg_ptr->flags & R_PREALLOCATED_MACRO)
01191         {
01192           continue;
01193         }
01194 
01195       if (vreg_ptr->flags & R_PREALLOCATED_FLYBY &&
01196           !(vreg_ptr->flags & R_SPILLED))
01197         {
01198           continue;
01199         }
01200       if (vreg_ptr->base_index != -1)
01201         flyby_constraints = Set_add (flyby_constraints, vreg_ptr->base_index);
01202     }
01203   for (vreg_ptr = R_vreg; vreg_ptr != NULL; vreg_ptr = vreg_ptr->nextReg)
01204     {
01205       if (vreg_ptr->flags & R_PREALLOCATED_MACRO)
01206         {
01207           continue;
01208         }
01209       regmap = L_find_region_regmap (region, vreg_ptr->index);
01210       if (regmap == NULL)
01211         continue;
01212 
01213       if (vreg_ptr->flags & R_SPILLED)
01214         {
01215           /*
01216              if ( regmap->spill_loc == -1 )
01217            */
01218           regmap->flags = L_REGION_VREG_SPILL;
01219           regmap->spill_loc = vreg_ptr->spill_loc;
01220 
01221           if (regmap->phys_reg != -1)
01222             {
01223               /* Only convert from base_index to phys_register if the */
01224               /* thing has been allocated once to begin with.         */
01225               bank = R_bank + R_Ltype_to_Rtype (regmap->ctype) + regmap->type;
01226               phys_map =
01227                 R_map[R_Ltype_to_Rtype (regmap->ctype) + regmap->type];
01228               regmap->phys_reg =
01229                 phys_map[regmap->phys_reg - bank->base_index];
01230               regmap->type = R_conv_rclass_to_Lclass (regmap->type);
01231             }
01232         }
01233       else if (vreg_ptr->base_index != -1)
01234         {
01235           /*
01236              if ( regmap->phys_reg == -1 )
01237            */
01238           regmap->flags = L_REGION_VREG_ALLOC;
01239           regmap->phys_reg = vreg_ptr->phys_reg;
01240           regmap->type = R_conv_rclass_to_Lclass (vreg_ptr->rclass);
01241         }
01242 
01243       if (regmap->phys_reg == -1)
01244         {
01245 #if 0
01246           fprintf (stderr, "Constraining %d with flybys:", vreg_ptr->index);
01247           Set_print (stderr, "", flyby_constraints);
01248 #endif
01249           /* only need to add further constraints if not yet allocated */
01250           regmap->occupied =
01251             Set_union_acc (regmap->occupied, flyby_constraints);
01252 
01253           if (vreg_ptr->flags & R_CONTAINS_JSR)
01254             {
01255               Set occupied = NULL;
01256               /* A flyby virtual register that has not yet been allocated */
01257               /* cannot be allocated to a caller saved register.  Doing so */
01258               /* would result in an incorrect allocation for the current  */
01259               /* region, since spill code would be required around the    */
01260               /* subroutine calls.                                        */
01261               bank = R_bank + vreg_ptr->type + R_CALLER;
01262               if (bank->defined)
01263                 for (reg = bank->base_index;
01264                      reg < bank->base_index + bank->max; reg += bank->res_inc)
01265                   {
01266                     occupied = Set_add (occupied, reg);
01267                   }
01268               bank = R_bank + vreg_ptr->type + R_MACRO_CALLER;
01269               if (bank->defined)
01270                 for (reg = bank->base_index;
01271                      reg < bank->base_index + bank->max; reg += bank->res_inc)
01272                   {
01273                     occupied = Set_add (occupied, reg);
01274                   }
01275               regmap->occupied = Set_union_acc (regmap->occupied, occupied);
01276             }
01277         }
01278       occupied_phys_reg = NULL;
01279       n_reg = Set_2array (regmap->occupied, reg_array);
01280       for (i = 0; i < n_reg; i++)
01281         {
01282           int found;
01283           reg = reg_array[i];
01284           found = 0;
01285           for (j = 0; j < R_MAX_BANK; j++)
01286             {
01287               bank = R_bank + j;
01288               if (bank->defined &&
01289                   bank->base_index <= reg &&
01290                   reg < (bank->base_index + bank->max))
01291                 {
01292                   int *phys_map;
01293 
01294                   phys_map = R_map[bank->type + bank->rclass];
01295                   if (bank->type == vreg_ptr->type)
01296                     {
01297                       occupied_phys_reg = Set_add (occupied_phys_reg,
01298                                                    phys_map[reg -
01299                                                             bank->
01300                                                             base_index]);
01301                       found = 1;
01302                     }
01303                 }
01304               if (found)
01305                 break;
01306             }
01307         }
01308       if (occupied_phys_reg != NULL)
01309         {
01310           Set_dispose (regmap->occupied);
01311           regmap->occupied = occupied_phys_reg;
01312         }
01313     }
01314 
01315   if (flyby_constraints)
01316     flyby_constraints = Set_dispose (flyby_constraints);
01317 }
01318 
01319 int
01320 R_init_spill_stack (L_Region * region, int *int_spill_stack,
01321                     int *fp_spill_stack, int *pred_spill_stack)
01322 {
01323   L_Attr *attr;
01324 
01325   if (R_Region_Based_Allocation == 1)
01326     {
01327       /* There better be a swap attribute on the region so we know */
01328       /* how big the swap space is at the moment.                  */
01329       if ((attr = L_find_attr (region->attr, "swap")) != NULL)
01330         {
01331           *int_spill_stack = (int) attr->field[0]->value.i;
01332           if (attr->max_field >= 2)
01333             {
01334               *fp_spill_stack = (int) attr->field[1]->value.i;
01335             }
01336           else
01337             {
01338               *fp_spill_stack = 0;
01339             }
01340           if (attr->max_field >= 3)
01341             {
01342               *pred_spill_stack = (int) attr->field[2]->value.i;
01343             }
01344           else
01345             {
01346               *pred_spill_stack = 0;
01347             }
01348           return (*int_spill_stack + *fp_spill_stack +*pred_spill_stack);
01349         }
01350       else
01351         {
01352           L_punt ("R_init_spill_stack: No swap size provided on region %d\n",
01353                   region->id);
01354           return 0;
01355         }
01356     }
01357   else
01358     {
01359       /* Function based allocation starts at zero */
01360       *int_spill_stack = 0;
01361       *fp_spill_stack = 0;
01362       *pred_spill_stack = 0;
01363       return (0);
01364     }
01365 }
01366 
01367 
01368 void
01369 R_update_region_spill_stack (L_Region * region)
01370 {
01371   L_Attr *attr;
01372 
01373   if (R_Region_Based_Allocation == 1)
01374     {
01375       if ((attr = L_find_attr (region->attr, "swap")) != NULL)
01376         {
01377           attr->field[0]->value.i = (ITintmax) int_spill_stack;
01378           attr->field[1]->value.i = (ITintmax) fp_spill_stack;
01379         }
01380       else
01381         {
01382           L_punt ("R_update_region_spill_stack: cannot update swap size for "
01383                   "region %d\n", region->id);
01384         }
01385     }
01386 }
01387 
01388 
01389 L_Region *
01390 R_assemble_region (L_Func * fn)
01391 {
01392   L_Cb *cb;
01393   L_Attr *attr;
01394   L_Region *region;
01395 
01396   if (R_Region_Based_Allocation == 1 && fn->first_region != NULL)
01397     {
01398       if (fn->first_region->next_region != NULL)
01399         L_punt ("R_assemble_region: "
01400                 "Function contains multiple regions, which one??\n");
01401 
01402       if ((attr = L_find_attr (fn->first_region->attr, "reg_func_weight")) !=
01403           NULL)
01404         fn->weight = attr->field[0]->value.f2;
01405 
01406       return (fn->first_region);
01407     }
01408   else
01409     {
01410       /* Build a region from the function body */
01411       region = L_new_region_in_func (fn, 0);
01412 
01413       region->next_region = fn->first_region;
01414       fn->first_region = region;
01415 
01416       for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb != NULL; cb = cb->next_cb)
01417         {
01418           if (cb->region != NULL)
01419             L_remove_cb_from_region (cb->region, cb);
01420 
01421           L_add_cb_to_region (region, cb);
01422           if (L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (cb->flags, L_CB_PROLOGUE))
01423             L_add_entry_cb_to_region (region, cb, NULL);
01424           else if (L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (cb->flags, L_CB_EPILOGUE))
01425             L_add_entry_cb_to_region (region, cb, NULL);
01426         }
01427       return (region);
01428     }
01429   return (NULL);
01430 }
01431 
01432 void
01433 R_disassemble_regions (L_Func * fn)
01434 {
01435   L_Cb *cb;
01436 
01437   /* 
01438    * We are not performing region-base register allocation, so let's
01439    * rip the region data structures back out of the function so that
01440    * they don't cause any trouble.
01441    */
01442 
01443   for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb != NULL; cb = cb->next_cb)
01444     {
01445       if (cb->region != NULL)
01446         {
01447           L_remove_cb_from_region (cb->region, cb);
01448           cb->region = NULL;
01449         }
01450     }
01451   L_delete_region (fn->first_region);
01452   fn->first_region = NULL;
01453 }
Generated on Sat Aug 30 17:59:09 2014 for libregalloc by  1.4.7
